channel.title: CVE Feed for PgPool Global Development Group -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PgPool Global Development Group -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-45624|2024-09-12T14:22:14.553Z -- pgpool%20global%20development%20group -- pgpool-ii
item.description: Exposure of sensitive information due to incompatible policies issue exists in Pgpool-II. If a database user accesses a query cache, table data unauthorized for the user may be retrieved.
